contracts.notes: Default x402 asset on BITE V2 Sandbox 2 is USDC (decimals 6). You can override by deploying MockSKLA (or any mintable ERC20) and setting ASSET_ADDRESS / ASSET_DECIMALS accordingly.

notes: Deploy with: forge script script/DeploySKALE.s.sol --rpc-url $BITE_V2_SANDBOX_2_RPC_URL --broadcast --evm-version istanbul. Faucet: request sFUEL via SKALE Builders Telegram.
